WITH people AS( SELECT doc_no , mem_no FROM referer UNION SELECT doc_no , mem_no FROM approval_line ) SELECT count(*) FROM people p INNER JOIN approval_document ad ON p.doc_no = ad.doc_no WHERE p.mem_no = #{memNo} and doc_title like '%' || #{docTitle} || '%'
and doc_form = #{docForm}
select doc_no , mem_name , dept_name from referer r join employee e on e.mem_no = r.mem_no join department d on d.dept_code = e.dept_code where doc_no = #{docNo}

select doc_no , ad.mem_no "mem_no" , mem_name , doc_title , doc_contents , to_char(doc_enroll_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "doc_enroll_date" , doc_retention , doc_grade , doc_status , doc_form from approval_document ad join employee e on e.mem_no = ad.mem_no where doc_no = #{docNo}

select doc_no , al.mem_no mem_no , mem_name , job_name , approval_status , approval_order from approval_line al join employee e on e.mem_no = al.mem_no join jobgrade j on j.job_code = e.job_code where doc_no = #{ docNo } order by approval_order
select att_origin_name , att_change_name , att_path , att_loadpath from approval_attachment aa join approval_document ad on ad.doc_no = aa.doc_no where aa.doc_no = #{docNo}
select mem_name "mem_no" , opi_content , to_char(opi_enrolle_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "opi_enrolle_date" from opinion o join employee e on e.mem_no = o.mem_no where doc_no = #{docNo}
